RuleLineEndWithEllipsis: Percentage of samples that don't end with “…”.
RuleLineEndWithTerminal: Percentage of samples where more than 60% of sentences end with punctuation (., !, ?, ;).
RuleSentenceNumber: Percentage of samples with 3 to 7,500 sentences.
RuleWordNumber: Percentage of samples with 20 to 100,000 words.
RuleAbnormalChar: Percentage of samples without strange or hidden characters.
RuleAbnormalHtml: Percentage of samples without HTML code or tags.
RuleAlphaWords: Percentage of samples where at least 60% of words are alphabetic (letters).
RuleCharNumber: Percentage of samples longer than 100 characters.
RuleColonEnd: Percentage of samples that don't end with a colon (:).
RuleContentNull: Percentage of samples that are not empty.
RuleContentShort: Percentage of samples longer than 20 characters.
RuleContentShortMultiLan: Percentage of samples shorter than 20 characters after cleaning.
RuleEnterAndSpace: Percentage of samples without too many line breaks and spaces together.
RuleEnterMore: Percentage of samples without 8 line breaks in a row.
RuleEnterRatioMore: Percentage of samples where line breaks take up less than 25% of the content.
RuleHtmlEntity: Percentage of samples without HTML entities (like  ).
RuleHtmlTag: Percentage of samples without HTML tags (like <div>).
RuleInvisibleChar: Percentage of samples without hidden characters.
RuleLatexSpecialChar: Percentage of samples without LaTeX markup.
RuleLineJavascriptCount: Percentage of samples that don't contain the word “javascript”.
RuleLoremIpsum: Percentage of samples that don't contain Lorem Ipsum filler text.
RuleMeanWordLength: Percentage of samples with average word length between 3 and 10 letters.
RuleSpaceMore: Percentage of samples that don't contain 500 spaces.
RuleSpecialCharacter: Percentage of samples without unusual characters.
RuleStopWord: Percentage of samples where at least 6% of words are common English stop words (like the, and, of).
RuleSymbolWordRatio: Percentage of samples where symbols make up more than 40% compared to words.
RuleOnlyUrl: Percentage of samples that are not URLs.
RuleDocRepeat: Percentage of samples without repeated identical lines.
RuleCapitalWords: Percentage of samples where at least 80% of words are lowercase.
RuleCurlyBracket: Percentage of samples where curly brackets {} and other characters aren't more than 10% of the text.
RuleLineStartWithBulletpoint: Percentage of samples that don't begin with a bullet point.
RuleUniqueWords: Percentage of samples where fewer than 10% of unique words are repeated too often.
